posts.post_content:

J. McLean/ G. Suggs, (Hal Chase too late).......PSA 8(OC)-  $375, Now only $350
Joe Birmingham/ T. Turner, (Birmingham's home run)......PSA 8(MC)-  $750, Now only $695

Please feel free to make reasonable offers, these are going to be sold by the end of the month...thanks
